aboutMe_content1: Hi everyone, i am Viktor, a passionated Full Stack-Developer based in Waldbroel.
aboutMe_content2: I create web applications with Java Spring Boot, JavaScript & Angular, both independently and as part of a team.
aboutMe_content3: I am fascinated by the diversity of programming and as a junior Full Stack developer I am looking for opportunities to showcase my skills.
aboutMe_content4: You are cordially invited to explore my public portfolio.
Feel free: Feel free to try out my latest development projects and look into their code..
Task manager inspired by the Kanban Syst: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
Jump, run and throw game based on object: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
Want to discuss a new project: Want to discuss a new project
Say hello! Let's discuss your ideas and: Say hello! Let's discuss your ideas and make it happen
